alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 21 at 10:49PM MST until August 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Several rounds of moderate to heavy rainfall are possible through Tuesday evening. Flash flooding caused by these rounds of excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...Northern Mohave County including Mesquite, Colorado City, and Mount Trumbull. * WHEN...Through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, washes, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should refrain from recreating in remote locations and ensure you have multiple ways to receive weather warnings should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
